meta.name: kubernetes
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: Kubernetes
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT mean("cpu_usage_nanocores") / 1000000  AS "cpu_usage_millicores" FROM :db:.:rp:.kubernetes_node WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("memory_usage_bytes") AS "memory_usage_bytes" FROM :db:.:rp:.kubernetes_node WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("cpu_usage_nanocores") / 1000000 AS "cpu_usage_millicores" FROM :db:.:rp:.kubernetes_pod_container WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("memory_usage_bytes") AS "memory_usage_bytes" FROM :db:.:rp:.kubernetes_pod_container WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("tx_bytes")) AS "tx_bytes_per_second" FROM :db:.:rp:.kubernetes_pod_network WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("rx_bytes")) AS "rx_bytes_per_second" FROM :db:.:rp:.kubernetes_pod_network WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("cpu_usage_nanocores") / 1000000 AS "cpu_usage_millicores" FROM :db:.:rp:.kubernetes_system_container WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
SELECT mean("memory_usage_bytes") AS "memory_usage_bytes" FROM :db:.:rp:.kubernetes_system_container WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND host=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
